featured.text: In winter, our skin tends to become dry and _____, a problem which is usually treated by applying lotions or creams.

definition.zh_def: 乳液，一種用於皮膚的液體，通常用於保濕或護膚。
definition.en_def: A liquid preparation applied to the skin for moisturizing or therapeutic purposes.
definition.example: She applied lotion to her dry hands after washing them.
